node.title: Prince William still cringes about the time he sang Livin' on a Prayer with Taylor Swift
node.alt: Prince William outside Sandringham Estate'sÂ Mary Magdalene Church wearing a parka, jeans and a very British flat cap.
node.description: The Duke of Cambridge says there was "a lot of sweating going on" up on stage but encourages people to have a good laugh about it.
node.content:
["Prince William has revealed some of his cringey and emotional moments in the final episode of the Apple Fitness+ series Time to Walk.", "The series features celebrities sharing stories, songs and photos, recorded while they're out on a walk, with the Duke of Cambridge choosing to highlight the importance of good mental health.\u00a0", "He went for a stroll through the grounds of Sandringham Estate, where Queen Elizabeth II and the rest of the royal family spend Christmas, for the final instalment of the 2021 series.\u00a0", "Here's what he talked about in the 38-minute episode:", "
That time he was was a backup singer with Taylor Swift
", "It was at the Winter Whites Gala, a fundraiser for the Centrepoint charity for homeless young people, at Kensington Palace in 2013.", "", "
Prince William says he's still cringing about this moment.\u00a0(Supplied: Duke and Duchess of Cambridge\u00a0)
", "Jon Bon Jovi started playing Livin' on a Prayer and heckled the royal to come up and sing.", "But it took Taylor Swift, who was sitting next to Prince William, to get him on stage.\u00a0", "\"She puts her hand on my arm, looks me in the eye, and says, 'Come on, William. Let's go and sing'.\"", "\"To this day, I still do not know what came over me... honestly, even now I'm cringing at what happened next, and I don't understand why I gave in.\"", "He said there was \"a lot of sweating going on\" up on stage as he was trying to remember the lyrics.\u00a0", "\"I\u00a0felt like a swan, where I was trying to keep myself composed on the outside, but inside\u00a0the little legs are paddling fast.\"", "Prince William said he decided to just roll with the awkwardness of it all to have a laugh, and encouraged people to try to stop micromanaging themselves and\u00a0not to take themselves too seriously.", "He also said it was OK to watch the video and have a laugh, so here's the excruciatingly cringey footage:", "
The emotional toll of being an air ambulance pilot
", "Prince William used to co-pilot East\u00a0Anglian Air Ambulance helicopters, flying critically ill people to hospital.", "He said there were traumatic moments during his stint with the service\u00a0and he'd had to reckon with the impact that had on his\u00a0mental health.\u00a0", "\"I was happy at home and happy at work, but I kept looking at myself, going, 'Why am I feeling like this? Why do I feel so sad?' and I started to realise that, actually, you're taking home people's trauma, people's sadness, and it's affecting you,\" he said.\u00a0", "", "
Prince William was a co-pilot for the\u00a0East\u00a0Anglian Air Ambulance\u00a0between March 2015 and July 2017.(Supplied: The Royal Family\u00a0)
", "He said talking about those experiences, particularly within his team, \"definitely helped\",\u00a0but recalling those times still made him \"quite emotional\".", "\"But I think, as a human being, when you see someone in such dire circumstances, basically at death's door, you can't help but not be affected by that,\" he said.\u00a0", "
Blasting music with Princess Diana on the way to school
", "Prince William recalled driving to boarding school with his mother Princess Diana and Prince Harry.\u00a0", "He said his mum would blast the tunes and sing \"at the top of her voice\" along the drive to ease their anxiety about going back to school.\u00a0", "\"One of the songs I massively remember and has stuck with me all this time, and I still, to this day, still quite enjoy secretly, is Tina Turner's The Best\u00a0because, sitting in the backseat, singing away, it felt like a real family moment,\" he said.\u00a0", "\"You'd be singing and listening to the music right the way out into the gates of school when they dropped you off.", "\"And\u00a0and that's when reality kind of sunk in that you really were going back to school\u00a0because before that\u00a0you're lost in songs.\"", "", "
Prince William shared memories of belting out Tina Turner songs with his mother, Princess Diana, when he was a boy.(Reuters)
", "
...and being an AC/DC fan
", "While we're on the topic of music, Prince William reckons the AC/DC classic Thunderstruck is the \"best tonic for Monday morning\".\u00a0", "\"[It] absolutely wakes you up, puts your week in the best mood possible, and you feel like you can take on anything and anyone,\" he said.\u00a0", "
How do I listen to Prince William's Time to Walk episode?\u00a0
", "It's available in the Workout app on Apple Watches with a Fitness + subscription.", "But Apple is also putting on three special audio airings of the episode on Apple Music 1, which is a streamable radio station.", "In Australia, that'll be 7pm AEDT\u00a0tonight and again at 3am AEDT and 8am AEDT tomorrow.\u00a0", "Those airings will be free to listen to, but you do need to have an Apple account to listen\u00a0because it's only streamed via Apple Music and iTunes.\u00a0\u00a0", "", "
Prince William's episode will be aired on Apple\u00a0Music\u00a01 in Australia at 7:00pm AEDT.\u00a0(Supplied: Apple)
"]
